modName: Better Arrows and Bolts (Faster and with no gravity)

descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]Better Arrows and Bolts[/size]
[size=1]v1.0[/size][/center]

A small mod that completely removes the gravity on ALL arrows and crossbow bolts and makes them much more faster. (DLC's and bound arrows included)
It should be compatible with ANY mod that doesn't modify any of the existing arrows/bolts in the game. It won't work correctly if it's not below any other mod in the load order that modifies any of the existing arrows/bolts in the game.

Uses content from both Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC.

Made with Skyrim Creation Kit 1.9.36.0 and tested on Skyrim Legendary Edition (all DLC's) 1.9.32.0
author: Boulderban
